titleStmt.title: The certaine and true newes, from all the parts of Germany and Poland to this present 29. of October, 1621. Published by authoritie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. K[ingston] for B. D[ownes] and are to bee sold by William Lee, at his shop in Fleetstreet, at the golden Bucke, neere Serieants Inne,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Identified as STC 11788 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetstreet, at the golden Bucke, neere Serieants Inne
